author: Tyler Clifford
title: Jim Cramer: Investors who bailed on Costco's quarter made a costly mistake
description: "It's never been a mistake to give Costco the benefit of the doubt," Jim Cramer of "Mad Money" says days after the retailer's mixed quarterly report.
content:
Investors must take "seemingly disappointing quarter" numbers from high-quality companies such as Costco Wholesale with a grain of salt and listen to what management has to say in the conference call, CNBC's Jim Cramer said Monday.
The warehouse retailer, pu… [+2664 chars]
